feed.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [BHS7][Network] - Network equipment operation
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 3, 07:00 - 11:00 UTC

Sep 22, 07:34 UTC
Scheduled - Due to an imponderable we have to postpone the intervention.
We will post a new update to indicate the new maintenance dates

Sep 22, 07:01 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Sep 8, 00:17 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 22/09/2022 07:00 UTC
End time : 22/09/2022 11:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : In order to maintain continuous improvement of our internal network infrastructure, we will upgrade the version of multiple network equipment.

entry.title: [Global][Managed Services] - Managed Baremetal
entry.content:
Oct 13, 16:53 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 13/10/2022 06:00 UTC
End Time : 13/10/2022 16:30 UTC
Root cause :Some disturbance on the network caused this malfunction
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Oct 13, 14:23 UTC
Identified - Update : The backlog of tasks is being dealt with.

Oct 13, 12:18 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 13/10/2022 06:00 UTC
Service impact : Add and remove baremetal actions on vrack can suffer of latencies.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are investigating on the issue.
Update will be post as significant progress is made.

entry.title: [SBG3][Dedicated Servers] - S330B02
entry.content:
Oct 13, 08:44 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 12/10/2022 09:00 UTC
End Time : 12/10/2022 09:40 UTC
Service impacted : Some servers were unavailable on rack S330B02.
Root cause : The incident was caused by a faulty multisocket which tripped the circuit breaker.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

entry.title: [GRA1][Dedicated Servers] - G101B09

Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Oct 13, 06:55 UTC
Identified - Start time : 13/10/2022 06:14 UTC
Service impact : All servers in this rack G101B09 are currently unreachable
Root cause : A failure on a network equipment.
Ongoing actions : Our technical team works on the replacement of the defective equipment.

entry.title: [SBG/LIM][Dedicated Servers] - Network
entry.content:
Oct 12, 09:16 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 12/10/2022 08:00 UTC
End Time : 12/10/2022 08:48 UTC
Root cause :Incident caused by ongoing operations on network equipment.
All impacted services are now operational.

Oct 12, 08:49 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 12/10/2022 08:00 UTC

Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.
